Direct the commercial activity of the channels in the Juan Manuel González de la Presa

Professional experience
April 2020 actual
Business Developer Manager for Distributors and System Integrators Spain and Portugal and KAM of the 2 bigger accounts in Spain and Portugal (one local OEM account and the other global account of EU in the automotive industry) in the BU Control Techniques.
MISSION OF THE POSITION
Direct the commercial activity of the channels in the BU in line with the company's strategy and general management to meet or exceed the short- and long-term objectives for the country. Achieve the annual sales plan and maintain established margins. Lead and generate new distributors and partners in collaboration with the sales team.
The report is made to locally to Business Leader, and globally to the EMEA BDD of the channels.
KAM of the 2 main customer off the BU of Control Techniques, the key objective is to maintain and to growth in both cases the business, and coordinate the different departments to give the best technical solutions, service of maintenance and commisioning, and commercial to this important customers .
MAIN FUNCTIONS
Direct the preparation of the strategy accord the company with the channel’s partners.
Growth the partners
Set price levels and discounts in these channels.
Establish Distributors meetings and roadshow.
Accompany commercials on visits to:
Make decisions in situations of problems with the channel interferences.
Promote actions with the aim of gain fidelity.
Establish pricing criteria used by commercials in these channels.
Responsibilities
Define the Partner sales plan together with the Country Leader and the EMEA BDD Channel.
Lead and develop the strategic of the channels, focused on the growth of the distributor network.
Represent at the levels above the Business Unit with our partners.
Support the commercial team, on the channels when needed.
February 2017 April 2020.
After Nidec's purchase from Emerson of the Control Techniques and Leroy Somer Divisions
Spain & Portugal Sales & Large Oem´s Manager in the BU Control Techniques in Nidec Industrial Automation Iberia S.A.
September 2103 to February 2017
After the Integration of Control Techniques Iberia S.A and Leroy Somer Iberia S.A at Emerson Industrial Automation S.A.
Sales Director Spain & Portugal Motors & Drives at Emerson Industrial Automation Iberia S.A. Commercially leading the Control Techniques brands and the gears and motors division of Leroy Somer
In both jobs my work profile is coincidental
MISSION OF THE POSITION
Direct the commercial activity of the BU in line with the company's strategy and general management to meet or exceed the short- and long-term objectives for the country. Achieve the annual sales plan and maintain established margins. Lead and motivate the sales, services, and sales support team in the country.
The report is made to the Business Leader and will be collaborated with in the reports to the group management.
MAIN FUNCTIONS
Direct the preparation of the business plan of each zona.
Establish the general lines of the Trading Strategy for the year and adapt it to the characteristics of each zone and trade.
Make the overall sales budget for the fiscal year and objectives by zone/commercial
Set price levels.
Track commercial action and results.
Establish meetings with the sales team.
Accompany commercials on visits to:
Make decisions in situations of after-sales problems with customers.
Propose solutions from a technical perspective and their development.
Perform feedback and behavioral and attitude detection actions to improve
Promote actions with the aim of closing projects.
Establish pricing criteria used by commercials.
Anticipate market developments and competition status/action, sharing and exchanging information with the entire sales team.
